greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of regular orientable coverings of the Klein bottle with 2n lists.
comment: Multiplicative defined by a(2^e)=2e+1 and a(p^e)=e+1 for e>0 and an odd prime p.
Dirichlet convolution of A000012 by A040001. - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 30 2011
a(n) is the number of full-dimensional lattices with volume n in Z^2 which are symmetric about a coordinate axis (equivalently, about both). - _Álvar Ibeas_, Mar 19 2021
link: Andrey Zabolotskiy, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
V. A. Liskovets and A. Mednykh, Number of non-orientable coverings of the Klein bottle

John S. Rutherford, Sublattice enumeration. IV. Equivalence classes of plane sublattices by parent Patterson symmetry and colour lattice group type, Acta Cryst. (2009). A65, 156-163. [See Table 1]. - From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 23 2009
formula: a(n) = d(n)+d(n/2) for even n and a(n) = d(n) otherwise where d(n) is the number of divisors of n (A000005).
Dirichlet g.f.: (1+2^(-s))*zeta^2(s) [ Rutherford] - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 23 2009
Moebius transform is period 2 sequence [ 1, 2, ...]. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 24 2012
a(n) = Sum_{ m: m^2|n } A304182(n/m^2). - _Andrey Zabolotskiy_, May 07 2018
Sum_{k=1..n} a(k) ~ 3*n*log(n)/2 + (3*gamma - 3/2 - log(2)/2)*n, where gamma is the Euler-Mascheroni constant A001620. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 04 2019
a(n) = A320111(n) + (A059841(n)*A000005(n)), i.e. a(n) = A320111(n) if n is odd, and a(n) = A320111(n) + A000005(n) if n is even. - _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 17 2021
maple: with(NumberTheory): seq(tau(n) + `if`(n::odd, 0, tau(n/2)), n=1..100); # _Peter Luschny_, Mar 19 2021
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, numdiv(n) + if( n%2, 0, numdiv( n / 2)))} /* _Michael Somos_, Mar 24 2012 */
xref: Equals row sums of triangle A143110. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Jul 25 2008
results.author: _Valery A. Liskovets_, Apr 07 2002
